gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 124, Jazz 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Jazz, 124-116. Sam Merrill recorded a new career-high 27 points and eight 3PM for the Cavaliers, with Caris LeVert adding 23 points, seven assists, and three rebounds in the victory. Lauri Markkanen tallied 26 points and 10 rebounds for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 16-12 in the regular season, while the Jazz fall to 10-18.
